name: Extreme Dirt Bike Stunts
description:
Welcome to Extreme Dirt Bike Stunt. Extreme Dirt Bike Stunt is the best physics-based bike game you get to play online. The game takes you deep into the city to face brand new exciting trials and challenges. 30 extreme levels await your trails rider skills with extreme obstacles ranging from containers and fire barrels to jump ramps. You will have to use your bike to expertly navigate your way through the obstacles. Extreme Dirt Bike Stunt features stunning and breath-taking graphics throughout the game to give you a real life ambiance. The game stunts have been designed to look very near to the real deal. The game continues till the rider fails to cross a hurdle. Enjoy the thrilling and adventurous X-Game Extreme Dirt Bike Stunts on your devices.

Game Features:
1. Awesome Dirt Bike Stunts Environment
2. Accurate Bike control physics
3. Dirt Bike Selection
4. Great 3D Game Graphics
5. 30 exciting and adventurous gaming levels

How to Play:
Select your bike to ride and start game level to enjoy the exciting touch and tilt controls.
- Tilt your device right or left to balance the dirt bike.
- Touch on screen to accelerate your bike.
